title: MD
biography: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine. Associated with University of Cambridge.
aiSummary: Robert Edwards is a reproductive medicine specialist with an H-index of 106 at University of Cambridge (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Oncology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
knowsAbout: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine
